file_content.text: I've tripled our encryption algorithms. No one's cracking our security again.
I know. I intercepted their listening post's final transmissions. Got some Republic secrets. Even heard their dying screams.
Twice now you've saved Intelligence, and I won't forget it. Now, if you'll excuse me, surveillance duty calls.
Heads will roll. Promise me that.
Those Intelligence reports you recovered? They're embedded with slicer signatures. Not from some gang, but from the Republic's Strategic Information Service!
The Republic will answer for their spineless scheme.
They'll pay.
Only the gutless Republic would cower behind a gang of criminals.
Cowards.
They must have been hiding something. Perhaps a listening post. Maybe they're spying on us right now!
The SIS used the slicer gang as a decoy. They must be covering up a listening post.
Clever to hide under scum.
They think they're so smart. But wait, if they have a listening post, they may be spying on us right now!
Let me guess. Intelligence wants the SIS outfit buried.
I bet you want them dead.
Yes. But first I want them to scream.
What does that mean?
The Republic stole these reports, then handed them to the slicer gang. Probably to keep their operation hidden.
If the SIS has a listening post, they may be spying on us right now!
The Republic? You're positive?
The signatures don't lie.
The SIS hid behind the slicer gang. But why? Maybe to disguise a listening post... maybe they're listening to us right now!
Do you hear me, SIS dogs? The dark side is about to crush your pathetic operation. Isn't that right, my lord?
Do you hear me, Republic filth? Soon you'll feel the sting of Intelligence! Isn't that right, agent?
You hear me, Republic slime? Nar Shaddaa's most fearsome mercenary is coming for your heads. Isn't that right, hunter?
You hear me, SIS filth? Subterfuge won't save you from the Empire's wrath! Isn't that right, my friend?
You hear me, SIS filth? My friends here are coming to grind your operation into the ground. Isn't that right?
Absolutely.
You better believe it.
You've helped once already, hunter. Do this, and Intelligence will pay you well.
Sure. Why not?
Discretion, officer. If the Republic's listening, they now know we're coming.
So much for a surprise attack.
I--I suppose you're right. But there's no time for subtlety.
Only if you pay me.
Fine. I'll arrange payment. Whatever you want.
The SIS signatures contained coordinates. Go there. Destroy the listening post. Kill everyone!
You're insane. [Refuse quest]
Good idea. Make the SIS think you're not interested, then bam! Wait--where are you going?
Excuse me, I'm on surveillance duty. The things Hutts do behind closed doors....
This is important. Slicers were selling Intelligence reports on the black market. I recovered them.
These... these are my reports!
Thank you, my lord. No telling what would happen if these fell into the wrong hands.
Excellent work, agent. Glad to see we still take care of our own.
If these had been leaked... Intelligence thanks you.
Wait. These reports are embedded with slicing signatures. This isn't some gang, it's the mark of the Republic's Strategic Information Service!
Sorry, surveillance duty. Who knew the Republic leadership had such a taste for Twi'lek companionship?
